title: Century Charm Meets Modern Living in Spacious Baluty Apartment
description: Step into a blend of history and elegance in this captivating four-bedroom apartment nestled in the heart of Baluty. With two modern bathrooms—including an ensuite master—warm wooden floors, and a cozy fireplace, this 132 sqm residence beautifully combines classic allure with contemporary comforts. The clever layout also includes ample co-working space and a stylish outdoor dining area for entertaining or relaxation. An underground garage and secure bicycle storage cater perfectly to urban lifestyles, making this an ideal sanctuary for professionals.
neighborhood_description: Baluty boasts a relaxed and distinctly tech-oriented vibe, where heritage meets innovation. With an abundance of parks, pet-friendly walking zones, and evolving coworking spaces, the neighborhood is tailored for those seeking balance between productivity and a slower pace of life. Convenient public transport links and close highway access connect you seamlessly to the rest of Lodz and beyond, making commutes effortless.
lifestyle_benefits: work-life balance in a tech-minded district
relaxed pace ideal for pet ownership
easy commutes by transit or car
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals and executives relocating for career advancement, especially those who work remotely or commute regionally, and value both historical character and modern facilities.
market_positioning: Stands out as a rare four-bedroom offering in Baluty, targeting the professional sector with exclusive historic charm plus productivity-enhancing amenities. Perfectly positioned between bustling city life and serene local parks, set at a competitive price for its unique blend of comfort and heritage in Lodz's prime medium-urban cluster.
